'''Passage of Clouds and Stars''' is an [[Event]] in [[Version 2.1]].

==Event Details==
===Duration===
* 2021/09/28 04:00 – 2021/10/13 05:59

===Requirements===
* [[Adventure Rank]] 5 or above

===Summary===
* Log in on seven days during the event to obtain Intertwined Fate ×10 and other rewards!
